name: machines
description: This set of libraries provides a way of writing **fully decentralised** applications using **replicated state machines**, but without any form of blocking coordination. Furthermore, the machines you deploy work together in the scope of a swarm protocol while the machine instances may play **different roles**. These roles may differ in their business logic as well as in the events they are allowed to consume; in other words the work can be distributed across different machines and split into separate responsibilities.
